attributes.action: Make the life sentance mean LIFE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I could go and kill some one right now, sure i would go to prison but only for about 12 years, so i will be the one laughing. This is unexceptable life must mean life. To abolish the death sentance and make it a round about 12 year sentance is not human rights, its not for the victum or victums family, a murderer charged with a life sentance should be in prison for life, hence until the day they die.

rejection.details:
Identical to your previous petition:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/victums-first/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
